selectRightHandJoin

public <U> java.util.List<U> selectRightHandJoin(U tableClass)
Returns a list of results, of the given type. The given type must be a part of a join query or an exception will be thrown

Specified by:
selectRightHandJoin in interface QueryInterface<T>

java.lang.IllegalStateException - - when not in join query
